lines.text:
[Making a toast]
And my little sister Chrissy, for teaching me that life is nothing if you're not obsessed.
We're all famous- just like the Jackson family!
Sometimes there's things more important than pit beef.

[talking through her Mary ventriloquist dummy]
Full of grace! Full of grace!
I love you Shelley! I love you more than Kodak!
Now give me the camera and unzip your pants and show me your hardware or I'm calling the police.
Don't become an asshole. I beg of you, do not become an asshole.
Ride it, bitch! Ride it like a butch bottom!
I love you, little Chrissy. No matter what.
Mary isn't a homosexual term, Tina.
Come on, be a good little girl and put your vagina up to the phone!
Don't become an asshole, Pecker. I beg of you do not become an asshole.
